reviewer_info: Posted by Naeem Ur Rehman on May 12, 2019
review_text: Bold looking with simple design, simple wheels with wheel cups and stock size dunlop enasave tyres, car is equipped with 1.0 liter 1kr-fe with CVT gear and eco idle as well. It is XLs variant with pushstart, headlight leveling and climate control AC along with safety feature of collision avoidance support system, lane departure warning system and traction control. It give me 15 to 17 km/L in city depending upon driving style on highway and motorway it give 20 to 22 km/l depending on driving behavior. Car is very comfortable and optimal groud clearance to drive with in city and hilly area as well.  I have traveled to naran kaghan and shogran on this car with ease. I own this car for past 1 year.
